definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Inf. cstr. Kö:i. 263) doubtful word;—[[שֵׂטִים הֶעְמִיקוּ]] ´[[וְשׁ]]: Ho 5:2 RV (cf. AV) the revolters are gone deep in slaughtering [‘Opferschlächterei’ Kö:ii. 1. 590, n. 1], Ew Now (formerly), Che in corrupting (rd. then [[שַׁחֲתָה]]); We Now GASm Marti [[שַׁחַת הַשִּׁטִּים]] have made deep the pit of Shiṭṭim (as place of idolatry).
